code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ChallengesWidget(){const challenges=[{title:'Weekly Profit Challenge',target:'5% Return',progress:60,status:'active'},{title:'Risk Management Master',target:'Max 2% Drawdown',progress:85,status:'active'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"widget challenges-widget",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Active Challenges"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"challenges-list",children:challenges.map((challenge,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"challenge-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"challenge-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:challenge.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"status ".concat(challenge.status),children:challenge.status})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"challenge-target",children:["Target: ",challenge.target]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar",style:{width:"".concat(challenge.progress,"%")}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"progress-text",children:[challenge.progress,"% Complete"]})]},index))})]});}
